item.description:
Connecticut Grassroots Alliance Candidate School
Saturday, February 13
Southington Police Department, 69 Lazy Lane
Exit 32 off I-84

Tentative Agenda

9-9:30 Coffee and...

9:30 Communicating with Voters: Joe Markley and Former State Senate President Phil Robertson

10:45 Connecticut's Budget: Where the Money Comes From, Where the Money Goes: Dowd Muska

12:00 Speaker TBA

12:30 Lunch

1:00 Precinct Plan: Tom Scott

2:00 Working with the GOP: Sarah Richards, Republican State Central Committee

Cost: $15 per person (cash please). Candidates are welcome to bring one key campaign worker.
By invitation only--if you know someone who should attend, please let us know.

Questions/RSVP: electioncentral@cox.net
item.name: Connecticut Grassroots Alliance Candidate School
